text:
Isaac Alvarez (26 July 1930 – 3 November 2020) was an Egyptian-born French actor, mime, and choreographer. He founded the École du théâtre du mouvement in Paris in 1956 with Jacques Lecoq. In 1981, he founded the Théâtre du Moulinage in Lussas.
Alvarez traveled across France to teach with the Comédiens-mimes de Paris.
Alvarez died in Aubenas, France on 3 November 2020 at the age of 90.
